long_description: Perfect for your next safari adventure or relaxing at the beach, the women's Lotus Hat from Sunday Afternoons delivers cool comfort under bright, sunny skies. Soft, lightweight polyester fabric resists rain, stains and packs flat for easy transport; dark coloring under brim reduces glare. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. 4 in. brim in front and 5 in. brim in rear keeps skin completely shaded. Internal security pocket at crown keeps small things like a key or cash hidden. Sunday Afternoons Lotus Hat features a moisture-wicking internal headband; mesh ventilation and adjustability at crown and under chin.
short_description: Perfect for your next safari adventure or relaxing at the beach, the women's Lotus Hat from Sunday Afternoons delivers cool comfort under bright, sunny skies.
